sn55.30:3.1: 30. Nandakalicchavisutta
sn55.30:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
sn55.30:4.2: Atha kho nandako licchavimahāmatto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn55.30:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho nandakaṃ licchavimahāmattaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn55.30:5.1: “Catūhi kho, nandaka, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
sn55.30:5.3: Idha, nandaka, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.30:5.8: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.30:5.10: Imehi kho, nandaka, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
sn55.30:6.1: Imehi ca pana, nandaka, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako āyunā saṃyutto hoti dibbenapi mānusenapi;
sn55.30:6.6: Taṃ kho panāhaṃ, nandaka, nāññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā sutvā vadāmi.
sn55.30:6.7: Api ca yadeva mayā sāmaṃ ñātaṃ sāmaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sāmaṃ viditaṃ, tadevāhaṃ vadāmī”ti.
sn55.30:7.1: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro puriso nandakaṃ licchavimahāmattaṃ etadavoca:
